name: FRigUnit_GetControlVector
doc: GetControlVector is used to retrieve a single Vector from a hierarchy, can be used for Controls of type "Position" or "Scale".

Control: The name of the Control to retrieve the Vector for.
Space:
Defines if the Control's Vector should be retrieved
in local or global space.
Vector: The current value of the control.
Minimum: The minimum value of the control.
Maximum: The maximum value of the control.
